# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="e55e0-102">Web'de Outlook'ta dilinizi, tarih ve saat biçiminizi veya saat diliminizi değiştirme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e55e0-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e55e0-103">Sayfanın üst kısmında,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e55e0-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="e55e0-104">**Ayarlar** > **Tüm Outlook ayarlarını görüntüleyin.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e55e0-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="e55e0-105">**Genel** > **Dil ve zaman**seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e55e0-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="e55e0-106">Kullanmak istediğiniz dili seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e55e0-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="e55e0-107">**Kaydet**'i seçin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e55e0-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e55e0-108">Daha fazla bilgi edinmek için [bkz.](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e55e0-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
